title: Maven Dependency Convergence & Conflict Resolution
description: Analyzes Maven dependency tree for version conflicts and convergence issues, providing resolution strategies.
template:
Resolve dependency conflicts in Maven project {{project_name}}.

1. Run dependency:tree analysis
2. Identify version conflicts:
   - Same artifact, multiple versions
   - Transitive dependency conflicts
   - Version convergence failures
3. Analyze dependency mediation:
   - Which version Maven selects and why
   - Impact of nearest definition rule
4. Detect problematic patterns:
   - Diamond dependencies
   - Circular dependencies
   - Conflicting transitive deps
5. Provide resolution strategies:
   - Dependency management section
   - Explicit exclusions
   - BOM (Bill of Materials) usage
   - Version property centralization
6. Recommend Maven Enforcer rules
7. Test compatibility of resolved versions
8. Document dependency management policy

POM file: {{pom_content}}

Output: Conflict Analysis | Resolution Plan | Updated POM Sections | Enforcer Configuration

examples.output_outline: Conflicts: jackson-databind (2.13.1 vs 2.14.2), slf4j-api (1.7.36 vs 2.0.6), guava (30.1 vs 31.1), resolution: use Spring Boot BOM for version management, exclude transitive jackson from old deps, enforce convergence rule, centralize versions in properties, test compatibility: jackson 2.14.2 compatible, slf4j 2.0.6 requires logback 1.3+
